Our pipeline and subsea engineering team is made up of very experienced personnel with many years of deepwater experience.

JACOULE’s strategic alliances with our international partners, allows us to engage cutting edge technology in delivering deepwater engineering solutions which minimizes downtime, increases production and ensures the operator’s project is successful.

Our solutions include:

  • Pipeline Emergency Repair
  • Inspection & Maintenance of Flexible Risers
  • Flow Assurance (Pre-FEED, FEED, DED)
  • Vibration Analysis (FIV, FLIP)
  • Deepwater Pipeline Repair
  • Material Selection & Corrosion assessment
  • Installation Analysis
  • Technical Due Diligence & 3rd Part Design Review

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ inner_shadow=”on” fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#1a1d24″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#398532″ background_color_gradient_end=”#000000″ global_module=”6641″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_fullwidth_menu menu_id=”54″ submenu_direction=”upwards” fullwidth_menu=”on” active_link_color=”#7cda24″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ menu_font=”||||||||” menu_text_color=”#dbd5d4″ menu_line_height=”0.5em” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” menu_text_color_tablet=”#398532″ menu_text_color_phone=”#398532″ menu_text_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” menu_font_size_tablet=”13px” menu_font_size_phone=”11px” menu_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” active_link_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” active_link_color__hover=”#dbe9a5″][/et_pb_fullwidth_menu][/et_pb_section]
